name: Funkin' (In Space)
description:
Help funky alien band deal with the gravity and play a symphony in space!

Press keys or point-and-click your mouse to play instruments when you need to. Oh, and don`t forget that you`ll have to grab them first because the gravity is low on this spaceship and you`ll have to control it (things are floating) . Game consists of 4 levels with unique soundtrack (with obvious references) that can be both challenging and fun (hopefully).

Controls

WASD – Control gravity  
Hold L Shift – Drums 
Hold Space – Piano 
8, U, I, O, P, J, Y / Left Mouse Button   – Grab/let go of floating instruments

8 – Violin  

U – Lyra 

I – Flute 

O – Tambourine  

P – Tuba  

J – Sax   

Y – Bass
